mapper.select: SELECT d.accomodation_detail_code , c.accomodation_category_name , r.region_name , m.id , m.company_name , d.check_inout , d.parking , d.registration_datetime , o.room_price FROM accomodation_detail AS d INNER JOIN accomodation_category AS c ON d.accomodation_category_code = c.accomodation_category_code INNER JOIN region AS r on r.region_code = d.region_code INNER JOIN company_member AS m ON m.company_member_code = d.company_member_code INNER JOIN goods_accomodation_option AS o ON o.accomodation_detail_code = d.accomodation_detail_code;
mapper.insert:
SELECT (CASE WHEN count(adc.accomodation_detail_code) = 0 THEN 'adc001' WHEN (Max(CAST(substring_index(adc.accomodation_detail_code,'adc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) > 999 THEN concat('adc',Max(CAST(substring_index(adc.accomodation_detail_code,'adc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) ELSE concat('adc',LPAD(Max(CAST(substring_index(adc.accomodation_detail_code,'adc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1,3,0)) END) AS accommodationDetailCode FROM accomodation_detail AS adc;
INSERT INTO accomodation_detail (accomodation_detail_code , accomodation_category_code , region_code , company_member_code , id , check_inout , parking , registration_datetime) VALUES (#{accommodationDetailCode} ,select accomodation_category_code from accomodation_category where accomodation_category_name = #{accommodationCategoryName} ,select region_code from region where region_name = #{regionName} ,select company_member_code from company_member where id = 'id003' ,select id from company_member where id = 'id003' ,#{checkInOut} ,#{parking} ,now())
